title: Analyze and optimize backend/src/database models
description: Review backend/src/database/models for any TypeScript errors, missing indexes, or relationship issues. Ensure all models follow best practices for Sequelize ORM and have proper type definitions. Focus on improving query performance and data integrity.

title: Review and improve backend/src/middleware security
description: Audit backend/src/middleware for security vulnerabilities, especially in authentication, authorization, and validation middleware. Ensure HIPAA compliance, proper error handling, and that all PHI access is logged appropriately. Check for rate limiting and CSRF protection.

title: Optimize backend/src/services API integration
description: Review backend/src/services and backend/src/integrations for efficient API patterns. Look for opportunities to implement caching, batch processing, and better error handling. Ensure services follow the repository pattern and have proper dependency injection.

title: Enhance backend/src/health-record domain logic
description: Analyze backend/src/health-record module for business logic improvements. Ensure proper validation of health data, audit logging for PHI access, and compliance with healthcare regulations. Review DTOs, controllers, and services for completeness and error handling.

title: Improve backend/src error handling and logging
description: Review backend/src/errors and logging patterns across the application. Implement consistent error handling middleware, structured logging with appropriate log levels, and ensure sensitive data is never logged. Add health check endpoints and improve observability.
